general_notes: Participant 33823 seems to have a more negative experience with Covid than participant 1045. Participant 33823 also seems to be more opinionated about vaccines and boosters.

codes_explanation.technology: There were no technical difficulties during the conversation, so I coded this as a 1.
codes_explanation.cur_neg_affect: The participant mentions that Covid was a shitty experience, so I coded this as a 3.
codes_explanation.past_neg_affect: The participant mentions missing a day of school, so I coded this as a 4.
codes_explanation.communal_orientation: The participant asks questions and seems to be engaged in the conversation, so I coded this as a 5.
codes_explanation.engagement: The participant is engaged in the conversation and seems to be genuinely interested in what the other person has to say, so I coded this as a 6.
codes_explanation.defensiveness: The participant does not seem to be defensive in justifying their beliefs/perspective, so I coded this as a 2.
codes_explanation.vaccine_importance: The participant believes that vaccines are important, so I coded this as a 7.
codes_explanation.booster_importance: The participant believes that boosters are important, so I coded this as a 7.
codes_explanation.cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrates cognitive complexity by considering different perspectives and recognizing nuance, so I coded this as a 5.
